page.title: 14RECREATION cont'd
page.content: During the winter months aerobics and keep fit classes are held in the town hall. Community education classes are held in the local secondary and primary schools in a variety of topics and hobbies. For the youth in the community there are voluntary organisations such as Scouts and Guides. There is also a majorettes group and a Maybole Pipe Band. The town has a number of public houses which also provide social facilities such as darts teams playing in a local league. There is a local rugby club and junior football teams. Local churches also provide clubs and social gatherings for their members.
